html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-02522024-03-25TC
ActCanada Shipping Act, 2001
SubjectRegulations Amending the Administrative Monetary Penalties and Notices (CSA 2001) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES AND NOTICES (CSA 2001) in order to (1) adjust existing penalty ranges up to the new allowable maximum of $250,000 per violation under certain regulations; and (2) designate existing requirements as violations under certain regulations and prescribe a range of penalties.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0049 Publication Date: 2024-04-10
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the ADMINISTRATIVE MONETARY PENALTIES AND NOTICES (CSA 2001) in order to (1) adjust existing penalty ranges up to the new allowable maximum of $250,000 per violation under certain regulations; and (2) designate existing requirements as violations under certain regulations and prescribe a range of penalties.
